item.description:
Healing Your Body, Mind, Heart and Soul
Mother Clare Watts
Friday, September 18 â€¢ 7:30 p.m.

True healing takes place on every level. It is a thorough process not only reserved for the special or the enlightened. People try medicines, herbs, the right vitamin; but still there are no lasting results for the one who desires real healing. The healing has to be deeper than what these physical remedies can provide in order to create real and lasting results. Come to this workshop and receive the key to unlock your way to true healing, the way to real peace, and go away equipped to make it a reality.

Suggested Donation: $25

www.CentersOfLight.org
item.name: Seminar in Rhode Island: Healing Your Body, Mind, Heart and Soul
